>OOC: i assume you mean Sideswipe Soulstice  :::Ratchet/Sideswipe:::
>::Ratchet gets hit by one of the shots.  He feels fine at first, but then
>feels a pain in his legs. they ahve been immobilized by the shots. Now he
>cannot dodge anything:: Ratchet: SLAG! ::He can still move his arms,
>though, so he fires 15 shots from each gun and  2 tusk missles at
>Speedbreaker:: ~~~~~ ::Sideswipe transforms to car mode and escapes
>Beastbox's attack, but he gest  hit by Squawtalk's shots. he fires 1
>missle at Beastbox and 1 at Squawktalk::   Yahoo!

Speedbreaker celebrates his hit. "Yessss" but dosent see the weapons coming
at him and his hit hard, and sent flying back far, huge holes where the
missiles hit him.

Wildrider skids to a stop, as he notices fresh meat. "Atta boy
Speedbreaker. Wildrider to the rescue, dun duh dun duh dun" he yells as he
hits his gas as hard as he can to run over Ratchet.

Beastobox is hit by the missile and is sent flying back, smoke following
him. "Damn autobot, got no manners"
